strapiPost.title: Show Time
strapiPost.content:
The Arts Center of the Ozarks has rebranded as “Art One Presents.” 

  • Who: Art One Presents is a non-profit organization based in Springdale that provides performing and visual arts experiences across Northwest Arkansas, designed to engage the NWA community.
  • The beginning: The launch event for Arts One Presents is on Thursday starting at 4:30p at Walter Turnbow Park in Springdale. The event will be a part of the (rescheduled) Live at Turnbow event with live music performances and a community art project. 

Click HERE to see what Arts One Presents has in store.
